# Of Authenticity

## Challenge

Given some numbers starting with 3082.

## Solution

Recognize this is an x.509 DER certificate.

Wrote small script to convert:

```python
from cryptography import x509
from cryptography.hazmat.backends import default_backend

hex_data = ""

# Convert hex string to bytes
cert_bytes = bytes.fromhex(hex_data)
cert = x509.load_der_x509_certificate(cert_bytes, backend=default_backend())

# Print subject
print("Subject:", cert.subject) # really just looked at it, but then narrowed down to here. 
```

Flag could be found in the subject: `ctf{96b18cbe-8051-44e7-8dde-6f7e5170f6dc}`.
